title: Publications
text:
(Merollini et al., 2024) (Williams et al., 2025) (Ng et al., 2024) (Cabilan et al., 2023) (Zhou et al., 2023) (Davenport et al., 2021) (Bagnall et al., 2019) (Jones, Lavery, et al., 2019) (Jones, Bagnall, et al., 2019) (Morgan et al., 2019) (Nguyen et al., 2018b) (Jones et al., 2018) (Nguyen and Jones, 2018) (Nguyen et al., 2018a) (Ovenden et al., 2016) (Jones et al., 2016)



Williams, T. J., Mickenbecker, M., Smith, N., et al. (2025) Efficacy of cold piecemeal EMR of medium to large adenomas compared with sessile serrated lesions. Gastrointestinal Endoscopy, 101, 178–183. Elsevier.


Merollini, K. M., Collins, L. G., Jones, A. T., et al. (2024) Factors impacting hospitalisation and related health service costs in cancer survivors in australia: Results from a population data linkage study in queensland (COS-q). Cancer Medicine, 13, e70201. Wiley Online Library.


Ng, M. S. Y., Jones, A. T., Mallett, A. J., et al. (2024) Better kidney allograft survival despite higher-risk donor and recipient characteristics between 1995 and 2014. Nephrology Dialysis Transplantation, 39, 1846–1855. Oxford University Press.


Cabilan, C., Eley, R., Snoswell, C., et al. (2023) Inter-rater reliability of the occupational violence risk assessment tool for emergency departments. Australasian Emergency Care, 26, 54–58. Elsevier.


Zhou, X., Edirippulige, S., Jones, A., et al. (2023) The feasibility, acceptability and efficacy of an app-based intervention (the coping camp) in reducing stress among chinese school adolescents: A cluster randomised controlled trial. PLOS One, 18, e0294119. Public Library of Science San Francisco, CA USA.


Davenport, D., Butcher, P., Andreotti, S., et al. (2021) Effective number of white shark (Carcharodon carcharias, Linnaeus) breeders is stable over four successive years in the population adjacent to eastern australia and new zealand. Ecology and Evolution, 11, 186–198. Wiley Online Library.


Bagnall, J. J., Jones, A. T., Karavarsamis, N., et al. (2019) The fully visible boltzmann machine and the senate of the 45th australian parliament in 2016. Journal of Computational Social Science, 1–27. Springer.


Jones, A. T., Bagnall, J. and Nguyen, H. (2019) BoltzMM: An R package for maximum pseudolikelihood estimation of fully-visible Boltzmann machines. The Journal of Open Source Software, 4, 1193.


Jones, A. T., Lavery, S. D., Le Port, A., et al. (2019) Sweepstakes reproductive success is absent in a New Zealand snapper (Chrysophrus auratus) population protected from fishing despite “tiny” Ne/N ratios elsewhere. Molecular Ecology. Wiley Online Library.


Morgan, J. A., Sumpton, W. D., Jones, A. T., et al. (2019) Assessment of genetic structure among Australian east coast populations of snapper Chrysophrys auratus (Sparidae). Marine and Freshwater Research, 70, 964–976. CSIRO.


Jones, A. T., Nguyen, H. D. and McLachlan, G. J. (2018) logKDE: Log-transformed kernel density estimation. The Journal of Open Source Software, 3, 870.


Nguyen, H. D. and Jones, A. T. (2018) Big data-appropriate clustering via stochastic approximation and Gaussian mixture models. In Data Analytics: Concepts, Techniques and Applications, pp. 55–72. CRC Press.


Nguyen, H. D., Jones, A. T. and McLachlan, G. J. (2018a) Positive data kernel density estimation via the LogKDE package for R. In: Australasian Conference on Data Mining, 2018, pp. 269–280. Springer.


Nguyen, H. D., Jones, A. T. and McLachlan, G. J. (2018b) Stream-suitable optimization algorithms for some soft-margin support vector machine variants. Japanese Journal of Statistics and Data Science, 1, 81–108. Springer.


Jones, A., Ovenden, J. and Wang, Y. (2016) Improved confidence intervals for the linkage disequilibrium method for estimating effective population size. Heredity, 117, 217. Nature Publishing Group.


Ovenden, J., Blower, D., Jones, A., et al. (2016) Can estimates of genetic effective population size contribute to fisheries stock assessments? Journal of Fish Biology, 89, 2505–2518. Wiley Online Library.
